original_text: the tribune ordered him to be brought into the barracks, saying that he should be examined by flogging, to find out why they were shouting against him like this.
korean_text: 천부장이 바울을 영내로 데려가라 명하고 그들이 무슨 일로 그에 대하여 떠드는지 알고자 하여 채찍질하며 심문하라 한대

sentences.original_text: to be brought into the barracks
saying that he should be examined
to find out why they were shouting
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 왜 소리치고 있는지 알아내기 위해
